addOrEdit.requestCodeMaxlength: Request code cannot be enter more than 20 characters
addOrEdit.projectNameMaxlength: Project name cannot be enter more than 200 characters
addOrEdit.overtimeReasonTypeTextNumber: Overtime reason cannot be enter more than 500 characters
addOrEdit.startTimeValid: Start time must not be less than 7 days and must be in this month
addOrEdit.endTimeValid: End time must not be less than 7 days and must be in this month
addOrEdit.endTimeStartTime: End time must be longer than start time
addOrEdit.validateOT: Register OT only from 17h30 to 8h tomorrow
addOrEdit.biggestSevenDays: The registration period should not exceed 7 days from the current date.
addOrEdit.smallThanSevenDays: The registration period should not be less than 7 days from the current date.
addOrEdit.blank: Time from now cannot be left blank.
addOrEdit.holidayTimeRule: Hourly value from now to now must be outside office hours (8:00-17:30).
addOrEdit.startSmallThanEnd: The value from now on must not exceed the value up to now.
addOrEdit.noPass1: The value from now to now is not less than 1 hour.
addOrEdit.noPass3: The value between now and now should not exceed 3 hours.
addOrEdit.noPass8: The value between now and now should not exceed 8 hours.
